sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; impo import { Container, Row, Col, Badge, Card, Form, InputGroup, } from "react-bootstrap"; function WeatherCard() { return (
{weather.main && (

{weather.name} {weather.sys.country}

{Math.round(weather.main.temp)} °C

max: {Math.round(weather.main.temp_max)} °C

min: {Math.round(weather.main.temp_min)} °C

Sunrise
{" "} {new Date(weather.sys.sunrise * 1000).toLocaleTimeString( "en-IN" )}

Sunset
{" "} {new Date(weather.sys.sunset * 1000).toLocaleTimeString( "en-IN" )}

{moment().format("dddd")}
{moment().format("LL")}
{weather.weather[0].description}
)}
) } export default WeatherCard
